lines.text: Miss Moore, for what it's worth, if you really do decide to get a gun, go out, and kill those three men who raped you... I wouldn't lose any sleep over it.
That's the difference between us. I would.
[Roxanne shows Arnie the dead body of Norman Chaney across his desk]
Mr. Chaney. I didn't actually touched him. But I'm pretty sure he's dead.
If he is, I got dibs on his office.
What's going on?
Mr. Chaney's dead.
Oh, no!
Yep. I found him.
Sergeant, the little hand is on the nine. And the big hand is on the 12. I gotta be downtown like in 30 minutes.
Soon as your client's through with breakfast. Meantime, why don't you let the officer pat you down?
What's the matter? You guys don't get enough at home?
I'm getting tired of your mouth, Jose.
Whoa! Show me some respect. The name is Sifuentes, Victor Sifuentes!
I don't care if you're freakin' name is Pancho freakin' Villa! You don't see your client without you get searched! Now assume the freakin' position!
You lay a hand on me, and I'm gonna kick your fat butt.
That's it. You are outta here!
Let go my arm!
[In Spanish]
You swine! You son of a pooched out pig!

[Telephoning]
Tell him East L.A. later this afternoon.

[Speaking Spanish]
You're gonna be hearing more about this, McKlosky!
I can't freakin' wait!
[Sifuentes leaves]
Michael Kuzak, attorney representing Justin Pregerson. I'd like to talk to the investigating officer.
Which that would be Detective Tuttle.
Yeah, I'll get right up to it.
[Hang up the phone]
Lester, to his friends.
What's all the excitement?

Memo out of Devision. We gotta search all attorneys before they go in. Lawyer brought a gun I to South Central. His client tried to shoot his way out. Speaking of which, your client is a real citizen, counselor. This time we got him on rape, assault, oral cop, sodomy. Not to mention that he's violated his probation in six different ways.
Presumption of innocence, Lester.
The victim ID'd the kid's vehicle and picked him and two accomplices out of lineup. Let's see his daddy buy him outta this one.
